meanings.definition: Having a large and heavy body; stout or corpulent.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was the portliest animal at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: She pointed to the portliest pumpkin in the patch.
meanings.sent3: The portliest cat in the neighborhood always wins the staring contests.
meanings.sent4: His portliest suitcase was bursting at the seams with souvenirs.
meanings.sent5: The portliest cloud in the sky looked like a giant marshmallow.

meanings.definition: The most portly person in the room.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa was the portliest at the family reunion.
meanings.sent2: The portliest always gets the comfiest chair.
meanings.sent3: The portliest of the group led the way to the buffet.
meanings.sent4: In the land of elves, he was the portliest gnome.
meanings.sent5: The portliest of the dwarves had a booming laugh.
